# RFP-002865-Insolvency Processing Services
**Contract Title:** RFP-002865-Insolvency Processing Services
**Contract Number:** CB-215-50496265
**Tender Close Date:** Thursday, July 19, 2024 @ 2:00:00 PM ET

## Background and Scope
The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is inviting proposals for specialized insolvency and proof of claims services tailored for bankruptcy proceedings. The successful Service Provider will provide the following services:

* Insolvency and proof of claims services
* Bankruptcy law services
* Liquidation law services

Under the contract, the Service Provider will provide services on a non-exclusive basis for an initial term of three years, with the potential to renew for two subsequent one-year renewals, not to exceed a cumulative total of five years.

## Tender Information
The anticipated value of the service is up to $296,625.00 CDN for the initial term and all renewals, including all applicable taxes.

## Tenders and Proposals
Interested Service Providers must download the solicitation document and attachments directly from the tender page on canadabuys.canada.ca. For all inquiries or submissions, please contact:

* Tim Webster
  Phone: 613-748-5680
  Email: [tjwebste@cmhc-schl.gc.ca](mailto:tjwebste@cmhc-schl.gc.ca)

## Evaluation Criteria
The selection of the Service Provider will be based on a combined criteria of technical merit and price. TheSuccessful proponent will be selected based on the highest combined rating.

Please note that the contract is a competitive tender, where Service Providers must follow the tender requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

## Closing Information
The tender close date and time is Thursday, July 19, 2024 @ 2:00:00 PM ET. Please submit all proposed documentation, questions, or concerns to the contact information above before the deadline.
